short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The FASTEST way to see a newly published apartments on ImmoScout24 🔥

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wondering how to find an apartment in Berlin? 🔍 Well, you should CATCH it first! 🧲

Catch a Flat extension is a FREE and THE FASTEST way to see a newly published flat! 🔥 Start it and be the FIRST to apply, only SECONDS after the flat is published.⏱️ 
The more flats you catch, the more you visit, the higher are your chances 📈

🚀 Quick Start Tips:
1️⃣ Add Catch A Flat extension to Chrome and pin it in your Extensions window
2️⃣ Go to immobilienscout24.de, start your search and set filters you want
3️⃣ Click on Catch A Flat extension and toggle it ON. Now it’s refreshing the page in the background! 

📣 Once a new flat is published, you will get a Chrome Notification 📣. Click it to see the flat and apply right away! 🥳

❓ Frequently Asked Questions:
📌 How does is it work?
💡 Catch a Flat is a Chrome extension that refreshes the immoscout24 page in the background and looks for new flats for you. Once a new flat appears - you will see a notification, click to it to be redirected to the flat.

📌 Can I use it for free?
💡 Yes, extension is available as a free Chrome extension

📌 How do I install?
💡 To install Catch A Flat, go to the Chrome Web Store and select "Add to Chrome". It will be added to your browser, and you can start using it.

📌 Why not us ImmoScout App Notifications or Telegram bots?
💡 Catch a Flat is FASTEST way to see a new post, the delay is maximum 20 seconds, while ImmoScout24 notifications have 1-3 minutes delay, Telegram Bots have 3-5 minutes delay. 

📌 Does it work for any other websites?
💡 At the moment it only works for immobilienscout24.de, but if you would like to have other websites added, drop us a website name at 'catchaflatlabs@gmail.com'

📌 Why I cannot see any notifications?
💡 You might have disabled notifications from Chrome browser in your OS. Enable them back and notifications will work again. Check our Troubleshooting guide here: https://tinyurl.com/catchaflat

📌 Is my privacy protected when using extension?
💡 Absolutely! Extension operates locally within your browser, ensuring the privacy and security of your personal information. It does not collect or store any user data.
